document.full_text: prime minister vladimir putin said on wednesday russia was emerging powerfully from the global financial crisis but must reduce its reliance on energy and raw materials to see off external threats to its economy.
document.title: putin warns russia against economic complacency
lines_and_colors: prime minister vladimir putin said on wednesday russia was emerging powerfully from the global financial crisis but must reduce its reliance on energy and raw materials to see off external threats to its economy.
